name: ITP - Construction - StormWater Stage 2 - Sydney Street, Invercargill
template name: ITP - Construction - StormWater Stage 2 - Sydney Street, Invercargill

name: Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - Ensure ITP has been reviewed and signed off by the DM. No work may proceed unless this has been signed.
2 - Ensure Approved Plans are on site. Safety/ Environmental/  Quality/ Asbestos/ TTMP/ Permits/ Consents/ Site Plans
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - All plans/ permits produced under pre construction avaiable on site al all times
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - Video record site walk over
Frequency - Prior to work starting on site
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) -  PowerNet and Chorus has been located, refernce back to plans to ensure everthing has been located
5 - Correct materials delivered to site in acceptable condition

Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - Complete inspection of materials as they arrive to site (particularly the concrete pipe)                                             Engineers Rep to inspect materials
Inspection / Test Point - Inspection / Test Point
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - Alignment to be setout and confirmed on site by Engineers Rep
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - Inspect subgrade as exposed and scala if required, contact manager for further instruction if deemed unsuitable
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - Complete Manhole Install Checklist
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - Engineers Rep to have viewed / inspected concrete formwork
Specification / Standard - AS/NZS 2566.2:2003 and Contract Doc
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - Pipe to be laid as per spec, contract and plans.
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - Complete checklist at the beginning of every day
12 - Saddles onto main for laterals and sumps
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - Instal as per construction plans
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - Compacted layers not exceeding 200mm or ⅓ the pipe OD (whichever is the least).
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - Complete unkown Service Checklist
Comments - Complete any time an unkonw service is encourtered
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - Complete Sump Install Checklist
Comments - Complete SR Sump checklist  for each sump
Specification / Standard - Contract Doc Appendix XIII
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - AP65 shall be in compacted layers not exceeding 200mm depth. Clegg testing to be done at 6m intervals, Record on ICC Clegg testing results sheet
Comments - Complete ICC Clegg record sheet
17 - Compaction of AP65 - Test results to Engineer

Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - AP65 shall be in compacted layers not exceeding 200mm depth. Ndm testing to 95% at 120m intervals where a Clegg is to be compared, Clegg testing to be done at 6m intervals
18 - Compaction of AP40 - Test results to Engineer
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - The basecourse layer shall be a minimum depth of 150mm for all applications. Ndm testing to 98% at 20m intervals
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - Flush and CCTV line and pass footage back to engineer for review
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - Engineer to approve area is ready for asphalt (including overcuts) . Prep is 50mm and has fall and compaction results have been recived
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - Complete Manhole Install Checklist
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - Engineers Rep to have viewed / inspected concrete formwork
Specification / Standard - AS/NZS 2566.2:2003 and Contract Doc
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - Pipe to be laid as per spec, contract and plans.
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - Complete checklist at the beginning of every day
24 - Saddles onto main for laterals and sumps
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - Instal as per construction plans
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - Compacted layers not exceeding 200mm or ⅓ the pipe OD (whichever is the least).
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - Complete Sump Install Checklist
Comments - Complete SR Sump checklist  for each sump
Specification / Standard - Contract Doc Appendix X
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - Record service on ICC encountered serives record sheet
Specification / Standard - Contract Doc Appendix XI
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - Record detail on ICC drainage connection sheet
Comments - Complete ICC drainage sheet for each laterial
Specification / Standard - Contract Doc Appendix XIII
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - AP65 shall be in compacted layers not exceeding 200mm depth. Clegg testing to be done at 6m intervals, Record on ICC Clegg testing results sheet
Comments - Complete ICC Clegg record sheet
30 - Compaction of AP65 - Test results to Engineer

Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - AP65 shall be in compacted layers not exceeding 200mm depth. Ndm testing to 95% at 120m intervals where a Clegg is to be compared, Clegg testing to be done at 6m intervals
31 - Compaction of AP40 - Test results to Engineer
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - The basecourse layer shall be a minimum depth of 150mm for all applications. Ndm testing to 98% at 20m intervals
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - Flush and CCTV line and pass footage back to engineer for review
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required) - Engineer to approve area is ready for asphalt (including overcuts) . Prep is 40mm and has fall and compaction results have been recived
